    • Constructor Detail

      • Pawn

        public Pawn(java.lang.String color,
            int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String piece,
            boolean firstMove)
        Constructor for pawn pieces
        Parameters:
        color - "w" is for white team, "b" is for black team
        x - X location on the board
        y - Y location on the board
        piece - "p" to represent pawn pieces on the board
        firstMove - check to see if piece made first move or not

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string appending the "p"(pawn piece) to the color/team "b"(black) or "w"(white)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        "bp" for color black, "wp" for color white

      • move

        public java.lang.String move(int currX,
                             int currY,
                             java.lang.String color,
                             Piece[][] board,
                             int newX,
                             int newY,
                             char promote,
                             boolean empassant)
        Check if move is allowed or not for pawn piece
        Overrides:
        move in class Piece
        Parameters:
        currX - current/old X location on the board
        currY - current/old Y location on the board
        color - the team/color of the piece
        board - board of the game where the piece is
        newX - new X location on the board
        newY - new Y location on the board
        promote - to handle pawn promotion
        empassant - to check if an empassant move is possible
        Returns:
        "w" if the next turn should be whites turn to move, "b" if the next turn should be blacks turn to move
